meanings.definition: Combine or cause to combine to form a single entity.
meanings.sent1: The two rivers are merging into one large stream.
meanings.sent2: I am merging the ingredients to make a delicious cake.
meanings.sent3: The colors in the painting are merging together like best friends.
meanings.sent4: The music and the dance are merging harmoniously on the stage.
meanings.sent5: The cars on the highway are merging smoothly into one lane.

meanings.definition: Blend or cause to blend gradually into something else.
meanings.sent1: The flavors are merging perfectly in this soup.
meanings.sent2: The colors of the sunset are merging into a beautiful gradient.
meanings.sent3: The sounds of nature are merging into a peaceful symphony.
meanings.sent4: The scents of the flowers are merging in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The voices of the choir are merging into a melodious chorus.

meanings.definition: Join or cause to join together.
meanings.sent1: The puzzle pieces are merging to reveal the complete picture.
meanings.sent2: The teams are merging their efforts to win the game.
meanings.sent3: The laughter of the children is merging with the chirping of birds.
meanings.sent4: The ideas are merging to create a brilliant solution.
meanings.sent5: The paths in the forest are merging into one main trail.
